inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addSkillBonus('Locks', 'Stackable', 10); effect.getBonuses().addSkillBonus('Traps', 'Stackable', 10); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Nimble Fingers
description: You are very good at dealing with delicate mechanical systems. You gain +10 to all Locks and Traps checks.
